name: No More Ants (free) - squash
description:
Ants, ants, ants, ants everywhere...

To beat the high score you have to crush as many ants as you can with your finger!
Now experience the action-packed game and crack the high score!

FEATURES:
- Leaderboard
- Various achievements
- Many blood and splatter effects
- 2 game-modes (time trial and splatter mania)
- fun ;-)

Get it now! You won’t regret it!
